abstracts.cdata!:
The project includes: I. Extension,
            through Participating Entities, of (i) short-term credit to
            farmers for the purchase of fertilizers, pesticides, seeds
            and other productive inputs and (ii) medium-term credit to
            farmers for the purchase of agricultural equipment, spare
            parts and other productive on-farm investments. II. A study
            regarding the role and reorganization of the Borrower's
            agencies providing public services to agriculture.
